xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/274603-Dragon in Fury 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/srzIhw9nziiEx7zLzlB9WDeFMEX.jpg When Chen Jun (Dragon Shek) returns home to Shanghai to find his former kung fu master (Gordon Liu) dead, he can't shake the hunch that a rival martial arts school is to blame. Readying himself for a full-fledged rampage of revenge, Chen first launches an investigation and then takes on the entire school, putting his years of martial arts training to the test. Dragon in Fury
